item.title: How to Edit the Microsoft Windows Clock Settings (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Change the Windows Clock Theme Color How to Switch Between Clock Modes: With Click With Keyboard How to Keep Windows Clock on Top How to Return Windows Clock Back to Full View How to Expand a Windows Clock Mode How to Restore a Windows Clock Mode How to Customize Notification Settings No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video:
